title: Ya'an Riverside City Break near Bifengxia Panda Base
description: Overlooking the glasslike waters of the Qingyi River, Crowne Plaza Ya’an, an IHG Hotel, offers guests a sophisticated riverside retreat in the heart of picturesque Sichuan. With an exterior celebrating the region’s most beloved bamboo-munching native - just 45 minutes from Bifengxia Panda Base - the hotel offers guests the perfect gateway to discovering bears, hidden gorges and ancient temples. If you're after Sichuan's signature spice, savour tongue-numbing cuisine at Guoboaoyuang.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Ya'an, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 9 South Ring Road, Yucheng District, Ya'an, Sichuan 625000, China

title: Sophisticated Sichuan Escape on Lush Mengding Mountain
description: In the heart of Chengdu's tea country, Holiday Inn Resort Mengding Mountain, an IHG Hotel is a serene sanctuary boasting sweeping mountain views. Discover Chinese tea culture in tea houses and plantations before riding the cable car to the peak for sweeping verdant vistas of the stunning mountainside. Make use of the modern fitness centre before satisfying your appetite at Honeydew restaurant and indulging in a smooth cocktail at the Tea bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Mengding Mountain, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Visitor Center, Mengding Mountain Scenic Zone, Mingshan District, Ya'an, Sichuan 625100, China
